description: AImpact Nexus Orchestrator‚Ñ¢ and AML‚Ñ¢ as the new industrial revolution
originalPrompt:
Create a powerful split-screen visualization showing the exact moment of industrial transformation!

Left side - OLD WORLD:
- Dark, smoky traditional factories with smokestacks
- Slow, manual assembly lines with human workers
- Pollution, inefficiency, and outdated technology
- Gray, depressing industrial landscape
- Symbols of the dying industrial age

Right side - NEW WORLD:
- Brilliant digital platform factories glowing with energy
- AI assembly lines creating platforms at light speed
- Clean, efficient, revolutionary technology
- Bright, inspiring digital landscape
- The future of business creation

The transformation moment:
- A wave of digital energy sweeping from right to left
- Old structures dissolving and being rebuilt as digital factories
- Traditional workers being replaced by AI coordination systems
- Pollution clearing as clean digital production takes over
- Revolutionary light overtaking industrial darkness

Visual effects:
- Dramatic contrast between old and new
- Energy wave showing the moment of change
- Transformation happening in real-time
- Sense of inevitable progress and revolution
- Hope and excitement for the digital future

No text - show the revolution happening before our eyes!
revisedPrompt: Generate a powerful split-screen image that narrates the transformation of the industrial age. On the left side, depict an old-world setting featuring dark, smoky traditional factories with smokestacks, human workers operating manual assembly lines and an overall gray, industrial landscape manifesting pollution and outdated technology. On the right side, illustrate a new world with bright, energetic digital platform factories, AI assembly lines working at light speed, and a clean, vibrant digital landscape showcasing innovative technology. In the middle, visualize a wave of digital energy sweeping from the new to the old, transforming structures and workers to digital entities, replacing pollution with clear air and industrial darkness with revolutionary light. No textual elements are needed. The overarching feeling conveyed should be one of inevitable progress, revolution, hope and excitement for the future.
